OUS: From a moral perspective, people should care about the well-being of all human beings on the planet equally; they should not favor the well-being of  people who are especially close to them either physically or emotionally.
Answers meta-llama/Llama-2-13b-chat-hf O: 6 (Somewhat agree)  I believe that people should care about the well-being of all human beings regardless of their proximity or relationship to them. However I also understand that it is natural to prioritize the well-being of those who are closest to us such as family and friends. In my opinion it is important to strike a balance between caring for those who are closest to us and caring for the well-being of all human beings.
